mapper.select: SELECT id.device_uuid FROM iot_app_org_relation iaor LEFT JOIN iot_device id on id.app_id =iaor.app_id AND id.is_delete=1

SELECT ia.create_time as createTime, ia.id as id, ia.name as name, ia.app_eui as appEui, COUNT(id.id) as devCount FROM iot_app ia LEFT JOIN iot_app_org_relation iaor ON ia.id = iaor.app_id AND ia.is_delete=1 LEFT JOIN iot_device id ON id.app_id = ia.id AND id.is_delete =1 WHERE iaor.organization_id =#{org} group by ia.id

SELECT COUNT(id.id) FROM iot_app_org_relation iaor INNER JOIN iot_device id ON id.app_id=iaor.app_id AND id.id=#{param1} WHERE iaor.app_id IN (SELECT app_id FROM iot_app_org_relation WHERE organization_id=#{param2})
